revised_title: A Historical Overview of Goddess Salus and Her Worship
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of the worship and devotion paid to Goddess Salus, the Roman goddess of health and well-being. It explores the various temples, statues, coins, and inscriptions dedicated to her, as well as the myths and legends surrounding her. The author also discusses the role of Telesphorus, the god of recovery, in the worship of Salus.
